title: Bug 6064Open on selection shouldn't require selection
description: (I notice that it currently works for a partial selection, if the selectionincludes the start of the type name, as if it's doing codeassist or something. )This is an issue for keyboard accessibility.It currently requires you to movethe cursor to the start of the word, hit CTRL+SHIFT+RIGHT to select the word,then F3.It would be better if you could just move to the word and hit F3.
EB: Bug 6064Open on selection shouldn't require selection Build 20011116 move the text insertion point into the middle of a type name in a Java editor press F3 it has no effectIt would be better if it opened on the current word.
